scripts.dev: concurrently -n client,server -c green,blue "npm run client" "npm run server"
scripts.install:all: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.start: concurrently -n client,server -c green,blue "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"
